$block: Represents a single diary appointment for a staff member.

$ul: **Cancelled**: Whether the appointment has been cancelled.
**CreatedAt**: The date/time this appointment was created.
**CreatedBy**: The staff member that created this appointment.
**ETag**: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.
**End**: The end date/time of this appointment.
**LinkedProperties**: A collection of properties linked to the appointment:-
**Recurrence**: The reccurrence interval for the appointment:-
**RemindAt**: The date/time to remind the staff member of this appointment.
**RemindBefore**: The number of minutes before the appointment start date/time to remind the staff member. -1 means don't remind.
**Staff**: The staff member holding this appointment.
**Start**: The start date/time of this appointment.
